timeline.bodyText: @kaikalur why were these tests using random(10) instead of an explicit value for the filter (or just a limit)?
timeline.author: rschlussel

replies.bodyText: Good point. We can make it a between 0 and 10 or something and get rid of the randomness.
replies.author: kaikalur

timeline.message:
Fix flaky testAndInFilter test

random(10) was returning 0 sometimes causing tests to be flaky
